name: PipelineDeals
description: PipelineDeals provides you with the easiest way to manage your sales pipeline. Sales teams use PipelineDeals to manage deal flow, track leads, run reports and close more deals. PipelineDeals is designed to be easy to use while providing your sales team with a powerful set of tools to best manage your sales process.

apis.name: PipelineDeals
apis.description: PipelineDeals is the easiest way for your sales team to organize your sales pipeline and grow your business. Thank you for your interest in the PipelineDeals API. and allows you to get started with writing custom applications quickly. The API was designed to cover all basic aspects of PipelineDeals objects,  The following example requires a PipelineDeals API key. If you already have an account and are an admin then go to the admin/api section of PipelineDeals.
